thread.title: SAP TechEd 2015: 2016 Will be Big Year for HCP with Addition of Private PaaS and Entire Mobile Portfolio
thread.title_full: SAP TechEd 2015: 2016 Will be Big Year for HCP with Addition of Private PaaS and Entire Mobile Portfolio

author: Dunlap, Charlotte
title: SAP TechEd 2015: 2016 Will be Big Year for HCP with Addition of Private PaaS and Entire Mobile Portfolio
text: The Page You Requested is Available Only to Subscribers Follow Current Analysis SAP TechEd 2015: 2016 Will be Big Year for HCP with Addition of Private PaaS and Entire Mobile Portfolio October 21,   Intelligence Alert SAP TechEd yielded no official announcements around HANA Cloud Platform, although there was a fair amount of buzz on upcoming enhancements including a comprehensive mobile service and private PaaS.
